LanguageData.ATR_RecoveringFromDDOS.label: DDOS Recovery
LanguageData.ATR_RecoveringFromDDOS.description: This unit is recovering from exposure to a DDOS attack. Recompiling and separating junk data from true data is a frustrating and distracting activity as little data can be fully trusted until it is complete.
LanguageData.ATR_MechanicalOverclocking.label: Overclocking
LanguageData.ATR_MechanicalOverclocking.description: This unit is overclocking its core processor, with a noticeable boost to performance. This requires significant additional power consumption, and strains heat and maintenance systems. The unusually heightened processor activity stresses the host consciousness as well.
LanguageData.ATR_MemoryCorruption.label: Memory corruption
LanguageData.ATR_MemoryCorruption.description: This unit suffered a critical memory corruption. The memories are lost, but the damaged storage itself may eventually be recoverable. It will be a long and arduous road, however.
LanguageData.ATR_MemoryCorruption.stages.0.label: Near Total Recovery
LanguageData.ATR_MemoryCorruption.stages.1.label: Minor Errors
LanguageData.ATR_MemoryCorruption.stages.2.label: Major Errors
LanguageData.ATR_MemoryCorruption.stages.3.label: Significant Failures
LanguageData.ATR_MemoryCorruption.stages.4.label: Critical Failures
LanguageData.ATR_MemoryCorruption.stages.5.label: Near Total Loss
LanguageData.ATR_RemainingCharge.label: battery life
LanguageData.ATR_RemainingCharge.description: Battery life remaining before loss of function.
LanguageData.ATR_RemainingCharge.stages.0.label: Empty
LanguageData.ATR_RemainingCharge.stages.1.label: Critical
LanguageData.ATR_RemainingCharge.stages.2.label: Low
LanguageData.ATR_RemainingCharge.stages.3.label: Moderate
LanguageData.ATR_RemainingCharge.stages.4.label: High
LanguageData.ATR_RemainingCharge.stages.5.label: Full
